cards.name: Xiong Mao, the Protector
cards.originalText:
[+1]: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, return a creature card with lesser converted mana cost from your graveyard to the battlefield.
[-1]: Other creatures and planeswalkers you control gain indestructible and can't have counters removed from them until your next turn.
[-X]: Exile X target cards from graveyards. Xiong Mao deals X damage to any target.
